subtitle: Mushrooms, rice, beans and spices are used in these spicy bites.

method.text: Heat the oil. Fry the onion for 5 min or until softened. Add the carrot and mushrooms. Cook for 2-3 min.
Stir in the ground spices, ginger and garlic. Stir fry for 2 min. Add the lentils, rice, tomato puree and seasoning with enough stock to moisten.
Gently cook for 10 min in a partly covered pan, adding more stock if necessary. The mixture should be stiff and not wet. Allow to cool. Stir in the parsley.
Cut the filo pastry sheets in half lengthways. Brush each one with the melted butter.
Put a tablespoon of the cooled filling at one end of each strip. Fold the corner of the pastry over the filling to form a triangle. Turn the triangle over and over to the end of the pastry.
Place the triangles on a baking tray. Brush with remaining melted butter. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake for 10-15 min until golden.
Meanwhile, mix together all the dip ingredients. Spoon into a small dish. Serve the cooked filo triangles with the minted yogurt.

title: Spiced filo triangles with yogurt and mint dip
